None.Name: Air Disruption
None.Description:
Every 3 seconds,
building blasts disrupting
projectiles into the air that deal 300
damage to units in a 5m radius, up
to 330 in total. Affects air targets
only. Has an extra-long range of
50m.

None.Name: Tainted Disruption
None.Description:
Activate to
interrupt every buff triggered by a
hostile building that affects the
entire current map. What is more,
every -hostile building in the
current game will take 15% more
damage for 15 seconds. Reusable
every 60 seconds.
